statements: SELECT * FROM user_subscription;
SELECT user_id, subscription_plan FROM user_subscription;
SELECT * FROM user_subscription WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT MAX(user_id) AS max_user_id FROM user_subscription;
SELECT subscription_plan, COUNT(*) AS count FROM user_subscription GROUP BY subscription_plan;
SELECT user_id, subscription_plan, billing_information FROM user_subscription;
SELECT subscription_plan, billing_information, user_id FROM user_subscription;
SELECT user_id, subscription_plan FROM user_subscription WHERE subscription_plan='Premium';
SELECT * FROM user_subscription WHERE user_id=123;
SELECT user_id, subscription_plan FROM user_subscription ORDER BY subscription_plan DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_subscription_plans;
SELECT user_id, plan_id, active FROM user_subscription_plans WHERE active = true;
SELECT user_id, plan_id, start_date, end_date FROM user_subscription_plans WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM billing_information ORDER BY payment_method DESC;
SELECT user_id, card_number, billing_address FROM billing_information WHERE user_id = '987e6543-e21b-45c6-b765-421327418765';
SELECT * FROM user_subscription_plans WHERE active = true
SELECT user_id, plan_id, start_date, end_date FROM user_subscription_plans WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM billing_information WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card' AND billing_address LIKE '%New York%'
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_plans FROM user_subscription_plans GROUP BY user_id
SELECT user_id, plan_id, start_date, end_date FROM user_subscription_plans ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, subscription_plan FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM subscription_plans ORDER BY plan_cost DESC;
SELECT u.username, b.payment_method FROM users u JOIN billing_information b ON u.user_id = b.user_id;

SELECT u.username, s.plan_name, b.next_billing_date FROM users u JOIN subscription_plans s ON u.subscription_plan = s.plan_name JOIN billing_information b ON u.user_id = b.user_id WHERE b.next_billing_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, subscription_plan, billing_address FROM users WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT u.username, b.payment_method, bp.plan_name FROM users u JOIN billing_information b ON u.user_id = b.user_id JOIN subscription_plans bp ON u.subscription_plan = bp.plan_name;
SELECT user_id, payment_method, next_billing_date FROM billing_information WHERE card_type = 'credit';

SELECT u.username, bp.plan_name, bi.next_billing_date FROM users u JOIN subscription_plans bp ON u.subscription_plan = bp.plan_name JOIN billing_information bi ON u.user_id = bi.user_id WHERE bp.plan_cost > 50;
SELECT username, email FROM users;
SELECT user_id, subscription_plan FROM users WHERE subscription_plan = 'Premium';
SELECT * FROM billing WHERE amount > 100.00 ORDER BY billing_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, billing_date, amount FROM billing JOIN users ON billing.user_id = users.user_id WHERE users.username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, start_date, end_date FROM subscriptions ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE subscription_plan = 'Premium' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT billing.billing_id, users.username, billing.amount FROM billing JOIN users ON billing.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT payments.payment_date, payments.payment_amount, billing.amount FROM payments JOIN billing ON payments.billing_id = billing.billing_id WHERE billing.amount > 100;
SELECT subscriptions.user_id, subscriptions.start_date, subscriptions.plan_name FROM subscriptions WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT email, subscription_plan FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT billing_address, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM payments GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT username, email, subscription_plan FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com'
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT u.username, p.amount, i.total_amount FROM users u JOIN payments p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN invoices i ON u.user_id = i.user_id WHERE p.amount > 100 AND i.total_amount > 100

SELECT u.username, s.start_date, s.end_date, i.issue_date FROM users u JOIN subscriptions s ON u.user_id = s.user_id JOIN invoices i ON u.user_id = i.user_id WHERE u.username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY i.issue_date ASC
SELECT u.username, p.amount, i.total_amount FROM users u JOIN payments p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN invoices i ON u.user_id = i.user_id WHERE i.issue_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
